overview:
Coach Gross currently coaches the Potomac Pre Academy team in Maryland and also conducts private clinics for players of all ages. Coach Gross helped shape the initial road map for bookacoach and used his years of experience as a player to ensure we focused on making life simple for both parents and athletes. Prior to brainstorming bookacoach, Marcus was a Sales Manager at Express Vending in London, UK where he achieved revenue growth of $5M to $75M in 5 years. Marcus was responsible for managing a team of 15 Senior Sales Executives, helping them develop into sales professionals through accompaniment and support.

Marcus was a professional soccer player in England, graduated from the University of Maryland BC with a B.S. in political science where he was a First Team All Conference Player three years in a row, made the All South Atlantic Team, was voted Team MVP Senior Year, and was recognized as Student Athlete of the Year across all sports at UMBC.
